quote: Winning isn't everything, but wanting to win is.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Winning isn't everything, but wanting to win is.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: It's just a job. Grass grows, birds fly, waves pound the sand. I beat people up.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: When my time on Earth is gone, and my activities here are past, I want them to bury me upside down, and my critics can kiss my ass.
author: Bobby Knight

quote: Don't measure yourself by what you have accomplished, but by what you should have accomplished with your ability.
author: John Wooden

quote: Never give up! Failure and rejection are only the first step to succeeding.
author: Jim Valvano

quote: To be the man, you have to beat the man.
author: Ric Flair

quote: They are who we thought they were!
author: Dennis Green

quote: Show me a guy who's afraid to look bad, and I'll show you a guy you can beat every time.
author: Lou Brock

quote: Sportsmanship for me is when a guy walks off the court and you really can't tell whether he won or lost, when he carries himself with pride either way.
author: Jim Courier

quote: Excellence is not a singular act but a habit. You are what you do repeatedly.
author: Shaquille O'Neal

quote: A champion is someone who gets up when he can't.
author: Jack Dempsey

quote: I wanna kiss you. I couldn't care less about the team struggling.
author: Joe Namath

quote: I can't play being mad. I go out there and have fun. It's a game, and that's how I am going to treat it.
author: Ken Griffey Jr.

quote: One man practicing sportsmanship is far better than 50 preaching it.
author: Knute Rockne

quote: A good coach will make his players see what they can be rather than what they are.
author: Ara Parseghian

quote: In the end, it’s extra effort that separates a winner from second place...
author: Jesse Owens

quote: It’s not the will to win that matters—everyone has that. It’s the will to prepare to win that matters.
author: Paul 'Bear' Bryant

quote: Most people run a race to see who is fastest. I run a race to see who has the most guts.
author: Steve Prefontaine

quote: It's not the disability that defines you; it's how you deal with the challenges the disability presents you with. We have an obligation to the abilities we DO have, not the disability.
author: Jim Abbott

quote: Do you know what my favorite part of the game is? The opportunity to play.
author: Mike Singletary

quote: I’ve worked too hard and too long to let anything stand in the way of my goals. I will not let my teammates down, and I will not let myself down.
author: Mia Hamm

quote: The time when there is no one there to feel sorry for you or to cheer for you is when a player is made.
author: Tim Duncan

quote: Let's go eat a God damn snack.
author: Rex Ryan

quote: Persistence can change failure into extraordinary achievement.
author: Matt Biondi

quote: Keep your dreams alive. Understand to achieve anything requires faith and belief in yourself, vision, hard work, determination, and dedication. Remember all things are possible for those who believe.
author: Gail Devers

quote: The Spirit of Sports: The spirit of sports gives each of us who participate an opportunity to be creative...
author: Dan O'Brien

quote:: I always tell kids, you have two eyes and one mouth. Keep two open and one closed. You never learn anything if you’re the one talking.
author: Gordie Howe

quote: Sports creates a bond between contemporaries that lasts a lifetime...
author: Bob Cousy

quote: Competitive sports are played mainly on a five-and-a-half inch court, the space between your ears.
author: Bobby Jones

quote: I have always tried to be true to myself, to pick those battles I felt were important...
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Every kid around the world who plays soccer wants to be Pele...
author: Pele

quote: Treat a person as he is, and he will remain as he is. Treat him as he could be, and he will become what he should be.
author: Jimmy Johnson

quote: Never give up, never give in, and when the upper hand is ours...
author: Doug Williams

quote: Pain is temporary. It may last a minute, or an hour, or a day, or a year...
author: Lance Armstrong

quote: Baseball is 90 percent mental. The other half is physical.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: It ain’t over till it’s over.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: When you come to a fork in the road, take it.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: You have to be able to center yourself, to let all of your emotions go.  Don’t ever forget that you play with your soul as well as your body.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: The Russians have a weapon that can wipe out two hundred eighty thousand Americans...
author: Red Smith

quote: Doctors and scientists said that breaking the four-minute mile was impossible...
author: Roger Bannister

quote: My dad has always taught me these words: care and share...
author: Tiger Woods

quote: Some people believe football is a matter of life and death...
author: Bill Shankly

quote: Whoever said, 'It's not whether you win or lose that counts,' probably lost.
author: Martina Navratilova

quote: I'll let the racket do the talking.
author: John McEnroe

quote: The way a team plays as a whole determines its success. You may have the greatest bunch of individual stars in the world, but if they don't play together, the club won't be worth a dime.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: It's not the size of the dog in the fight, but the size of the fight in the dog!
author: Archie Griffin

quote: Perhaps the single most important element in mastering the techniques and tactics of racing is experience...
author: Greg LeMond

quote: You need to play with supreme confidence, or else you'll lose again, and then losing becomes a habit.
author: Joe Paterno

quote: There are only two options regarding commitment. You're either IN or you're OUT. There is no such thing as life in-between.
author: Pat Riley

quote: You have to have the mentality of executing your game when you don't feel like there's a lot of hope...
author: Andre Agassi

quote: If you can believe it, the mind can achieve it.
author: Ronnie Lott

quote: Golf and sex are the only things you can enjoy without being good at them!
author: Jimmy Demaret

quote: Ask not what your teammates can do for you. Ask what you can do for your teammates.
author: Magic Johnson

quote: Leadership is a matter of having people look at you and gain confidence...
author: Tom Landry

quote: Football doesn't build character, it reveals character!
author: Marv Levy

quote: If you train hard, you'll not only be hard, you'll be hard to beat.
author: Herschel Walker

quote: The fewer rules a coach has, the fewer rules there are for players to break.
author: John Madden

quote: One day of practice is like one day of clean living. It doesn't do you any good.
author: Abe Lemons

quote: I figure practice puts your brains in your muscles.
author: Sam Snead

quote: An athlete cannot run with money in his pockets...
author: Emil Zatopek

quote: The more I practice, the luckier I get.
author: Gary Player

quote: This is really a lovely horse, I once rode her mother.
author: Ted Walsh

quote: When you get that nice celebration coming into the dugout and you’re getting your ass hammered by guys—there’s no better feeling than to have that done.
author: Matt Stairs

quote: I feel like I'm the best, but you're not going to get me to say that.
author: Jerry Rice

quote: We can't win at home. We can't win on the road...
author: Pat Williams

quote: Any time Detroit scores more than 100 points and holds the other team below 100 points...
author: Doug Collins

quote: I quit school in the sixth grade because of pneumonia...
author: Rocky Graziano

quote: I spent 90 percent of my money on women and drink...
author: George Best
